m!.text:
Configuration for https://turbowarp.org/
You can move, resize, and minimize this comment, but don't edit it by hand. This comment can be deleted to remove the stored settings.
{"framerate":60,"runtimeOptions":{"fencing":false},"interpolation":true,"width":640} // _twconfig_

WORDS: Welcome to Daniel's portfolio, to see some work you can access the menu at the bottom of the screen
Welcome to Daniel's portfolio, to see some work you can access the menu at the bottom of the screen
Hello. I'm Daniel, a Sixth Form student in my second year of A-Levels. I'm also a part-time coding Tutor.
After many years of not documenting my projects, I have decided to share all the cool things I have  made throughout the years.
My main coding language is Python and I also like to make music, art and games in my spare time.
To see all of my projects, you can navigate the menu below
PS, Do you like the text to speech? I hope you didn't think it was my real voice?
